attributes.action: Change the weekends off school to friday to sunday!
attributes.additional_details: We want you to do it so children can experience more of their lives and have more fun and enjoy their childhood while they can!
attributes.background: We want you to add an extra day to the weekend off school because i believe it is going to stress students to much. Friday to sunday should be the weekend!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Reduce the minimum length of the school week: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701169
